body.raw:
Software Engineer specializing in backend systems, distributed data pipelines, and cloud-native architectures. At CrÃ©dit Agricole CIB (via Capgemini), designed and modernized large-scale trade-data ingestion systems for multi-regulation compliance workflows (MAS, HKTR, JFSA, CFTC, MiFID and others), and delivered real-time data pipelines to downstream platforms. Strong experience in high-performance processing, Elasticsearch/DynamoDB optimization, and Kubernetes-based service modernization.

Huan holds a Master of Science in Artificial Intelligence from Nanyang Technological University (NTU) and a Master of Science in Mechanical Engineering from the Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (HKUST). In his free time, he enjoys exploring innovative software architectures and cloud technologies.
